title: 1549: Tips for Taking Off Stubborn Belly Fat, Ways to Build Work Capacity & Endurance, How to Combine At-Home Workouts With Gym Workouts & More (Listener Live Coaching)
description:
In this episode of Quah (Q & A), Sal, Adam & Justin answer four Pump Head questions via Zoom.

  • Sal’s weird injury. (4:04)
  • The Mind Pump wives are NOT average. (6:21)
  • Why is Sal so tired? (14:25)
  • The guys speculate on the reasoning behind the Bill and Melinda Gates divorce announcement. (17:28)
  • Mind Pump Investments: The rise and fall of large corporations and the stock market. (20:35)
  • Adam corrects himself on his recent comments on F45. (28:05)
  • New product alert from Caldera Lab! (31:51)
  • The guys are really bad at giving raises. (36:35)
  • How endurance training is lowering testosterone levels. (40:26)
  • Magic Spoon’s “Birthday Cake” is a HOT commodity. (43:14)
  • The art of food engineering. (45:41)
  • Sal breaks down the Shilajit supplement. (48:59)
  • #Quah question #1 – How do I build more muscle definition in my abs with my current calorie intake? (52:57)
  • #Quah question #2 – What is the best programming to build work capacity and endurance for my long hunts? (1:00:00)
  • #Quah question #3 – How do I mitigate my strength training gains with my outdoor endurance activities? (1:09:03)
  • #Quah question #4 – How can I combine at-home workouts with my gym workouts? (1:17:05)
